test_message: Define ideal customer profiles, buyer personas, pricing tiers (API/SaaS/Enterprise/Government), and 0-to-1 acquisition strategy for VEMAR.AI.

pain_points: Need for more accurate fraud detection

buyer_personas.title: Fraud Prevention Manager
buyer_personas.goals: Reduce fraud incidents, improve detection accuracy.
buyer_personas.objections: Concerns over integration complexity and cost.

buyer_personas.title: Government IT Officer
buyer_personas.goals: Secure citizen data, comply with regulations.

result.zero_to_one_strategy: Engage pilot customers in each ICP, develop case studies and proof-of-concept projects to validate solutions and build credibility.
